if_conditional.code:
If condition Then
     statements
End If
if_conditional.name: If conditional

if_else_conditional.code:
If condition Then
     statements
Else
     statements
End If
if_else_conditional.name: If/Else conditional

if_elseif_conditional.code:
If condition Then
     statements
ElseIf condition Then
     statements
End If
if_elseif_conditional.name: If/ElseIf conditional

if_elseif_else_conditional.code:
If condition Then
     statements
Else if condition Then
     statements
Else
     statements
End If
if_elseif_else_conditional.name: If/ElseIf/Else conditional

switch_statement.code:
Select Case expression
     Case x
          statements
     Case y
          statements
     Case Else
          statements
End Select
switch_statement.name: Switch statement

for_loop.code:
For expression To end
     statements
Next
for_loop.comment: Can also set a step: `For number as Double = 2 To 0 Step -0.25`
for_loop.name: For loop

foreach_loop.code:
For Each item in object
     statements
Next
foreach_loop.name: Foreach loop

list_comprehension.code:
Dim new_list = From item In iterable
               Where condition
list_comprehension.name: List Comprehension
